meanings.definition: A type of cabbage with a compact head of leaves.
meanings.sent1: I bought some fresh coles from the market for a salad.
meanings.sent2: The coles in the garden were ready to be harvested.
meanings.sent3: Why did the coles go to the dance? To have a head-spinning time!
meanings.sent4: The coles stood together like a tightly knit family.
meanings.sent5: The green coles looked like a small, dense forest of leaves.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Coles is our new neighbor down the street.
meanings.sent2: The Coles family has been living in this town for generations.
meanings.sent3: Why did Mrs. Coles bring a ladder to the party? To raise the roof!
meanings.sent4: The Coles surname echoed through the halls of history.
meanings.sent5: The name Coles was as solid as the foundation of a house.
